targets.rawSql:
select cast(try as text) as try  , 
      avg(aes_sender_tp) aes_sender_tp, 
      avg(plain_sender_tp) plain_sender_tp, 
      avg(aes_receiver_tp) aes_receiver_tp, 
      avg(plain_receiver_tp) plain_receiver_tp 
from 
(
select try,stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then tp/(case when '${type}'= 'bps' then 1 else 1310 end) else 0 end) aes_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp/(case when '${type}'= 'bps' then 1 else 1310 end) else 0 end) plain_sender_tp,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 1 then tp/(case when '${type}'= 'bps' then 1 else 1310 end) else 0 end) aes_receiver_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp/(case when '${type}'= 'bps' then 1 else 1310 end) else 0 end) plain_receiver_tp  
from(

  select is_aes,
      is_sender, 
      try,
  		stp , 
  		count(*) cnt, 
  		sum(case when tp_type = 'Gbits/sec' then tp*1000000000 else tp*1000000 end) tp, 
  		sum(case when t_type = 'MBytes' then tp*1000000 else t*1000 end)/1310 t, 
  		sum(rt) rt,
  		sum(rt)/(sum(case when t_type = 'MBytes' then tp*1000000 else t*1000 end)/1310) rt_rate 
  from send 
  where try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
  group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
  order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
  group by stp,try
) q
group by try;

select cast(try as text) as try  , 
      avg(aes_sender_tp) - avg(plain_sender_tp) sender_difference_tp, 
      avg(aes_receiver_tp) - avg(plain_receiver_tp) receiver_difference_tp--,
      --avg(bitrate) bitrate
from 
(
select try,stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then tp/(case when '${type}'= 'bps' then 1 else 1310 end) else 0 end) aes_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 1 then tp/(case when '${type}'= 'bps' then 1 else 1310 end) else 0 end) aes_receiver_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp/(case when '${type}'= 'bps' then 1 else 1310 end) else 0 end) plain_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp/(case when '${type}'= 'bps' then 1 else 1310 end) else 0 end) plain_receiver_tp, 
    avg(bitrate) bitrate
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp , 
		count(*) cnt, 
		sum(case when tp_type = 'Gbits/sec' then tp*1000000000 else tp*1000000 end) tp, 
		sum(case when t_type = 'MBytes' then tp*1000000 else t*1000 end)/1310 t, 
		sum(rt) rt,
		sum(rt)/(sum(case when t_type = 'MBytes' then tp*1000000 else t*1000 end)/1310) rt_rate,
		avg(bitrate) bitrate
from send 
where try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try) q
group by try;

select  cast(try as text) as t   , 
        (sum(aes_sender_tp) - sum(plain_sender_tp))/sum(plain_sender_tp) sender_difference_percent_tp, 
        (sum(aes_receiver_tp) - sum(plain_receiver_tp))/sum(plain_receiver_tp) receiver_percent_difference_tp
from 
(
select try,stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then tp else 0 end) aes_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 1 then tp else 0 end) aes_receiver_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp else 0 end) plain_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp else 0 end) plain_receiver_tp 
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp , 
		count(*) cnt, 
		sum(case when tp_type = 'Gbits/sec' then tp*1000000000 else tp*1000000 end) tp
from send 
where try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try) q
group by try;

select 0 as time  , sum(aes_sender_t) aes_sender_t, sum(plain_sender_t) plain_sender_t, sum(aes_receiver_t) aes_receiver_t, sum(plain_receiver_t) plain_receiver_t
from 
(
select try,stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then t else 0 end) aes_sender_t ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then 	 t  else 0 end) plain_sender_t,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 1 then t  else 0 end) aes_receiver_t ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 0 then 	 t  else 0 end) plain_receiver_t 
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp , 
		sum(case when t_type = 'MBytes' then t*1000000 else t*1000 end)/(case when '${type}'= 'bps' then 1 else 1310 end) t
from send 
where try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try) q ;

select 0 as time , 
      avg(aes_sender_tp) aes_sender_tp, 
      avg(plain_sender_tp) plain_sender_tp, 
      avg(aes_receiver_tp) aes_receiver_tp, 
      avg(plain_receiver_tp) plain_receiver_tp
from(
select try as time  , 
       avg(aes_sender_tp) aes_sender_tp, 
       avg(plain_sender_tp) plain_sender_tp, 
       avg(aes_receiver_tp) aes_receiver_tp, 
       avg(plain_receiver_tp) plain_receiver_tp
from 
(
select try,stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then tp else 0 end) aes_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp  else 0 end) plain_sender_tp,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 1 then tp  else 0 end) aes_receiver_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp  else 0 end) plain_receiver_tp 
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp , 
		sum(case when tp_type = 'Gbits/sec' then tp*1000000000 else tp*1000000 end)/(case when '${type}'= 'bps' then 1 else 1310 end) tp
from send 
where try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try) q
group by try)r;

select 0 as time , avg(sender_difference_tp) sender_difference_tp, avg(receiver_difference_tp) receiver_difference_tp
from (
select try as time  , avg(aes_sender_tp) - avg(plain_sender_tp) sender_difference_tp, avg(aes_receiver_tp) - avg(plain_receiver_tp) receiver_difference_tp
from 
(
select try,stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then tp/(case when '${type}'= 'bps' then 1 else 1310 end) else 0 end) aes_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 1 then tp/(case when '${type}'= 'bps' then 1 else 1310 end) else 0 end) aes_receiver_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp/(case when '${type}'= 'bps' then 1 else 1310 end) else 0 end) plain_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp/(case when '${type}'= 'bps' then 1 else 1310 end) else 0 end) plain_receiver_tp 
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp , 
		count(*) cnt, 
		sum(case when tp_type = 'Gbits/sec' then tp*1000000000 else tp*1000000 end) tp
from send 
where try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp
having try  in ( ${run} )
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try) q
group by try) r;

select 0 as time , avg(sender_difference_percent_tp) sender_difference_percent_tp, avg(receiver_percent_difference_tp) receiver_percent_difference_tp
from(
select try as time  , (avg(aes_sender_tp) - avg(plain_sender_tp))/avg(plain_sender_tp) sender_difference_percent_tp, (avg(aes_receiver_tp) - avg(plain_receiver_tp))/avg(plain_receiver_tp) receiver_percent_difference_tp
from 
(
select try,stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then tp/(case when '${type}'= 'bps' then 1 else 1310 end) else 0 end) aes_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 1 then tp/(case when '${type}'= 'bps' then 1 else 1310 end) else 0 end) aes_receiver_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp/(case when '${type}'= 'bps' then 1 else 1310 end) else 0 end) plain_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp/(case when '${type}'= 'bps' then 1 else 1310 end) else 0 end) plain_receiver_tp 
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp , 
		count(*) cnt, 
		sum(case when tp_type = 'Gbits/sec' then tp*1000000000 else tp*1000000 end) tp, 
		sum(case when t_type = 'MBytes' then tp*1000000 else t*1000 end)/1310 t, 
		sum(rt) rt,
		sum(rt)/(sum(case when t_type = 'MBytes' then tp*1000000 else t*1000 end)/1310) rt_rate
from send 
where try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try) q
group by try)r;

select cast(try as text) as try  , 
        sum(aes_sender_rt)/sum(aes_sender_t) aes_sender_rt, 
        sum(plain_sender_rt)/sum(plain_sender_t) plain_sender_rt
from 
(
select try,stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then rt else 0 end) aes_sender_rt ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then rt else 0 end) plain_sender_rt,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then t else 0 end) aes_sender_t ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then t else 0 end) plain_sender_t
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp , 
		sum(rt*1310) rt,
		sum(case when t_type = 'MBytes' then t*1000000 else t*1000 end) t
from send 
where try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try) q
group by try;

select cast(try as text) as try  ,  
        sum(aes_sender_rt)/sum(aes_sender_t-aes_sender_rt) aes_sender_rt, 
        sum(plain_sender_rt)/sum(plain_sender_t-plain_sender_rt) plain_sender_rt
from 
(
select try,stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then rt else 0 end) aes_sender_rt ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then rt else 0 end) plain_sender_rt,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then t else 0 end) aes_sender_t ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then t else 0 end) plain_sender_t
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp , 
		sum(rt*1310) rt,
		sum(case when t_type = 'MBytes' then t*1000000 else t*1000 end) t
from send 
where try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try) q
group by try;

select 0 as time  , (sum(plain_sender_rt)-sum(aes_sender_rt)) aes
from 
(
select try,stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then rt else 0 end) aes_sender_rt ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then rt else 0 end) plain_sender_rt,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then t else 0 end) aes_sender_t ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then t else 0 end) plain_sender_t
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp , 
		sum(rt*1310) rt,
		sum(case when t_type = 'MBytes' then t*1000000 else t*1000 end) t
from send 
where try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try) q ;

select 0 as time  , (aes_sender-plain_sender)/plain_sender aes
from (
select 0 as time  , sum(aes_sender_rt)/sum(aes_sender_t) aes_sender, sum(plain_sender_rt)/sum(plain_sender_t) plain_sender
from 
(
select try,stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then rt else 0 end) aes_sender_rt ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then rt else 0 end) plain_sender_rt,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then t else 0 end) aes_sender_t ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then t else 0 end) plain_sender_t
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp , 
		sum(rt*1310) rt,
		sum(case when t_type = 'MBytes' then t*1000000 else t*1000 end) t
from send 
where try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try) q )s;

select 0 as time  , sum(aes_sender_rt)/sum(aes_sender_t-aes_sender_rt) aes_sender_rt, sum(plain_sender_rt)/sum(plain_sender_t-plain_sender_rt) plain_sender_rt
from 
(
select try,stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then rt else 0 end) aes_sender_rt ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then rt else 0 end) plain_sender_rt,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then t else 0 end) aes_sender_t ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then t else 0 end) plain_sender_t
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp , 
		sum(rt*1310) rt,
		sum(case when t_type = 'MBytes' then t*1000000 else t*1000 end) t
from send 
where try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try) q ;

--Confidence interval = mean  CI(stddev  SQRT(n))

with   b as (
    

select (try-1)*1000 as time  , 
        (sum(aes_sender_tp) - sum(plain_sender_tp))/sum(plain_sender_tp) sender_difference_percent_tp, 
        (sum(aes_receiver_tp) - sum(plain_receiver_tp))/sum(plain_receiver_tp) receiver_percent_difference_tp
from 
(
select try,stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then tp else 0 end) aes_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 1 then tp else 0 end) aes_receiver_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp else 0 end) plain_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp else 0 end) plain_receiver_tp 
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp , 
		count(*) cnt, 
		sum(case when tp_type = 'Gbits/sec' then tp*1000000000 else tp*1000000 end) tp, 
		sum(case when t_type = 'MBytes' then tp*1000000 else t*1000 end)/1310 t, 
		sum(rt) rt,
		sum(rt)/(sum(case when t_type = 'MBytes' then tp*1000000 else t*1000 end)/1310) rt_rate
from send 
where try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try) q
group by try

), 
    probs as( SELECT 
                AVG(sender_difference_percent_tp)           as mean,
                COUNT(*)           as cnt,
                1.0*SUM(case when sender_difference_percent_tp>0 then 1 else 0 end)/COUNT(*) as proportion,
                stddev(sender_difference_percent_tp)         as stddev,
                stddev(sender_difference_percent_tp)/count(*) stderr,
                stddev(sender_difference_percent_tp)/count(*)/2 marginoferror
FROM b )



select time , 
        sender_difference_percent_tp, 
        sender_difference_percent_tp sender_difference_percent_tp_fill, 
        sender_difference_percent_tp   +${CI}*( probs.stddev / SQRT(probs.cnt)) up, 
         sender_difference_percent_tp -  ${CI}*( probs.stddev / SQRT(probs.cnt)) down,
         mean +   ${CI}*( probs.stddev / SQRT(probs.cnt)) CI_up, 
         mean -   ${CI}*( probs.stddev / SQRT(probs.cnt)) CI_down
from probs,  b
order by time;

panels.title: Overall  Sender Difference Percent By Run with CI

targets.rawSql:
--Confidence interval = mean  CI(stddev  SQRT(n))

with   b as (
    

select (try-1)*1000 as time  , 
        (sum(aes_sender_tp) - sum(plain_sender_tp))/sum(plain_sender_tp) sender_difference_percent_tp, 
        (sum(aes_receiver_tp) - sum(plain_receiver_tp))/sum(plain_receiver_tp) receiver_percent_difference_tp
from 
(
select try,stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then tp else 0 end) aes_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 1 then tp else 0 end) aes_receiver_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp else 0 end) plain_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp else 0 end) plain_receiver_tp 
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp , 
		count(*) cnt, 
		sum(case when tp_type = 'Gbits/sec' then tp*1000000000 else tp*1000000 end) tp, 
		sum(case when t_type = 'MBytes' then tp*1000000 else t*1000 end)/1310 t, 
		sum(rt) rt,
		sum(rt)/(sum(case when t_type = 'MBytes' then tp*1000000 else t*1000 end)/1310) rt_rate
from send 
where try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try) q
group by try

), 
    probs as( SELECT 
                AVG(receiver_percent_difference_tp)           as mean,
                COUNT(*)           as cnt,
                1.0*SUM(case when receiver_percent_difference_tp>0 then 1 else 0 end)/COUNT(*) as proportion,
                stddev(receiver_percent_difference_tp)         as stddev,
                stddev(receiver_percent_difference_tp)/count(*) stderr,
                stddev(receiver_percent_difference_tp)/count(*)/2 marginoferror
FROM b )



select time , 
        receiver_percent_difference_tp, 
        receiver_percent_difference_tp receiver_percent_difference_tp_fill, 
        receiver_percent_difference_tp   +${CI}*( probs.stddev / SQRT(probs.cnt)) up, 
         receiver_percent_difference_tp -  ${CI}*( probs.stddev / SQRT(probs.cnt)) down,
         mean +   ${CI}*( probs.stddev / SQRT(probs.cnt)) CI_up, 
         mean -   ${CI}*( probs.stddev / SQRT(probs.cnt)) CI_down
from probs,  b
order by time;

panels.title: Overall  Receiver Difference Percent By Run with CI

targets.rawSql:
select stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then tp else 0 end) aes_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp else 0 end) plain_sender_tp 
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp ,  
		sum(case when tp_type = 'Gbits/sec' then tp*1000000000 else tp*1000000 end) tp 
from send 
where try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try
order by time;

select stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 1 then tp else 0 end) aes_receiver_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp else 0 end) plain_receiver_tp 
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp ,  
		sum(case when tp_type = 'Gbits/sec' then tp*1000000000 else tp*1000000 end) tp 
from send 
where  try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try;

select time, (aes_sender_tp - plain_sender_tp) as sender_tp_difference --try,stp,
from(
select stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,--,try,stp,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then tp else 0 end) aes_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp else 0 end) plain_sender_tp 
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp ,  
		sum(case when tp_type = 'Gbits/sec' then tp*1000000000 else tp*1000000 end) tp 
from send 
where  try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try) r
where aes_sender_tp > 0 and plain_sender_tp > 0;

select time, ((aes_sender_tp - plain_sender_tp)/plain_sender_tp) as sender_tp_difference_percent --try,stp,
from(
select stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,--,try,stp,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then tp else 0 end) aes_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp else 0 end) plain_sender_tp 
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp ,  
		sum(case when tp_type = 'Gbits/sec' then tp*1000000000 else tp*1000000 end) tp 
from send  
where try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try) r
where aes_sender_tp > 0 and plain_sender_tp > 0;

panels.title: Total  Sender Difference Percent By Run&Step

targets.rawSql:
select time, (aes_receiver_tp - plain_receiver_tp) as receiver_tp_difference --try,stp,
from(
select stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,--,try,stp,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 1 then tp else 0 end) aes_receiver_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp else 0 end) plain_receiver_tp 
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp , 
		count(*) cnt, 
		sum(case when tp_type = 'Gbits/sec' then tp*1000000000 else tp*1000000 end) tp 
from send 
where  try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try) r
where aes_receiver_tp > 0 and plain_receiver_tp > 0;

select time, ((aes_sender_tp - plain_sender_tp)/plain_sender_tp) as sender_tp_difference_percent --try,stp,
from(
select stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,--,try,stp,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then tp else 0 end) aes_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp else 0 end) plain_sender_tp 
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp ,  
		sum(case when tp_type = 'Gbits/sec' then tp*1000000000 else tp*1000000 end) tp 
from send 
where  try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try) r
where aes_sender_tp > 0 and plain_sender_tp>0;

panels.title: Total  Receiver Difference Percent By Run&Step

targets.rawSql:
--Confidence interval = mean  CI(stddev  SQRT(n))

with   b as (
    

select  time  , (sum(aes_sender_tp) - sum(plain_sender_tp))/sum(plain_sender_tp) sender_difference_percent_tp, (sum(aes_receiver_tp) - sum(plain_receiver_tp))/sum(plain_receiver_tp) receiver_percent_difference_tp
from 
(
select try,stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then tp else 0 end) aes_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 1 then tp else 0 end) aes_receiver_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp else 0 end) plain_sender_tp ,
    sum(case when is_sender = 0 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp else 0 end) plain_receiver_tp 
from(

select is_aes,
    is_sender, 
    try,
		stp , 
		count(*) cnt, 
		sum(case when tp_type = 'Gbits/sec' then tp*1000000000 else tp*1000000 end) tp, 
		sum(case when t_type = 'MBytes' then tp*1000000 else t*1000 end)/1310 t, 
		sum(rt) rt,
		sum(rt)/(sum(case when t_type = 'MBytes' then tp*1000000 else t*1000 end)/1310) rt_rate
from send 
where try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
group by stp,try) q
group by time

), 
    probs as( SELECT 
                AVG(sender_difference_percent_tp)           as mean,
                COUNT(*)           as cnt,
                1.0*SUM(case when sender_difference_percent_tp>0 then 1 else 0 end)/COUNT(*) as proportion,
                stddev(sender_difference_percent_tp)         as stddev,
                stddev(sender_difference_percent_tp)/count(*) stderr,
                stddev(sender_difference_percent_tp)/count(*)/2 marginoferror
FROM b )



select time , sender_difference_percent_tp, 
        sender_difference_percent_tp   +${CI}*( probs.stddev / SQRT(probs.cnt)) up, 
         sender_difference_percent_tp -  ${CI}*( probs.stddev / SQRT(probs.cnt)) down,
         mean +   ${CI}*( probs.stddev / SQRT(probs.cnt)) CI_up, 
         mean -   ${CI}*( probs.stddev / SQRT(probs.cnt)) CI_down
from probs,  b
order by time;

panels.title: Difference Percent By Run with CI

targets.rawSql:
--Confidence interval = mean  CI(stddev  SQRT(n))

with   b as (
    select time, ((aes_sender_tp - plain_sender_tp)/plain_sender_tp) as sender_tp_difference_percent  
    from(
    select stp+(1000 * (try-1))  as time,--,try,stp,
        sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 1 then tp else 0 end) aes_sender_tp ,
        sum(case when is_sender = 1 and is_aes = 0 then 	 tp else 0 end) plain_sender_tp 
    from(

    select is_aes,
        is_sender, 
        try,
            stp ,  
            sum(case when tp_type = 'Gbits/sec' then tp*1000000000 else tp*1000000 end) tp 
    from send 
    where  try  in ( ${run} ) and strt >= ${strt} and stp <= ${stp}  and (( '${protocol}' = 'tcp' and is_tcp = 1) or ( '${protocol}' = 'udp' and is_tcp = 0) )
    group by is_aes,is_sender,try, stp 
    order by is_aes,is_sender, try, stp ) a
    group by stp,try) r
    where aes_sender_tp > 0 and plain_sender_tp>0

), 
    probs as( SELECT 
                AVG(sender_tp_difference_percent)           as mean,
                COUNT(*)           as cnt,
                1.0*SUM(case when sender_tp_difference_percent>0 then 1 else 0 end)/COUNT(*) as proportion,
                stddev(sender_tp_difference_percent)         as stddev,
                stddev(sender_tp_difference_percent)/count(*) stderr,
                stddev(sender_tp_difference_percent)/count(*)/2 marginoferror
FROM b )



select time , sender_tp_difference_percent, 
        sender_tp_difference_percent  + ${CI}*( probs.stddev / SQRT(probs.cnt)) up, 
         sender_tp_difference_percent  - ${CI}*( probs.stddev / SQRT(probs.cnt)) down
from probs,  b;
